paper_abstract: In this paper, we construct equity warrants pricing model under Fractional Brownian motion, deduce the European options pricing formula with a simple method, then propose the warrants pricing formula, and extend it to cover equity warrants oil a stock providing dividends. Finally, taking Changdian warrant in Chinese stock market as all example, we illustrate that the results based on the new warrants pricing formula is more accuracy than the classical results based on traditional pricing model. (c) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Equity warrants pricing model under Fractional Brownian motion and an empirical study
